name: 9 Hours 9 Persons 999 Bullets
description:
A fangame of 'Zero Escape: 9 Hours, 9 Persons, 9 Doors' made for 999 week 2021!

Help Junpei dodge the attacks the cast of 999 throw at him! Can he make it to the end and  Escape the Zero?!? Can you rack up a score great enough to disturb the timeline?!?!? Can you repeat what the hell is Ice-9 again?

Featuring music from Happy30's fantastic fan album Cipher's Silence, used with permission.
If you haven't yet, also be sure to play the original game, available on steam as part of 'Zero Escape: The Nonary Games'
